Line 30: Line 30:
==Phone backup==
==Phone backup==
â
Nokia ovi suite can perform a complete backup of the phone contents to a single file. This file uses the .nbu file extension, and this file format does not appear to be open/documented. The only official way to gain access to the contents of the backup is to restore it to the phone using nokia ovi suite, however, there are third-party programs that can read this files with some success, like [http://sourceforge.net/projects/nbuexplorer/ NBU Explorer] and [[noki]].
+
Nokia ovi suite can perform a complete backup of the phone contents to a single file. This file uses the .nbu file extension, and this file format does not appear to be open/documented. The only official way to gain access to the contents of the backup is to restore it to the phone using nokia ovi suite, however, there are third-party programs that can read this files with some success, like [http://sourceforge.net/projects/nbuexplorer/ NBU Explorer] ([[open-source]]) and [[noki]] (commercial with trial version available).
